General.Name: Merida Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Merida Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bicycles and components in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Europe, and the United States. It offers mountain bicycles, road bikes, fitness bikes, e-bikes, gravel bikes and trekking and city bikes, as well as bikes for youth and kids. It also provides speedometers; handlebars, stems, grips and bartapes, pedals, saddles, seatposts and clamps, protection and EQ parts, and spare parts; bags, backpacks, brackets, lights, bells, pumps, bottles and cages, tools, and locks; and apparel, such as jerseys, shorts, jackets and vests, gloves, socks and shoe covers, helmets, and sunglasses. Further, it offers women apparel. Merida Industry Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.
